manuscripts.title: Complex Discontinuities in Volterra Stein-Stein
manuscripts.abstract: We study complex discontinuities arising from the miscomputation of the Fourier-Laplace transform in the Volterra Stein-Stein model, which involves the complex square root of a Fredholm determinant. D...
manuscripts.keywords: Volterra Stein-Stein model, Fredholm determinant, Fourier-Laplace transform, Complex discontinuities, Fourier pricing

manuscripts.title: Dynamic MV Asset Alloc. in General Incomp. Markets
manuscripts.abstract: This paper studies dynamic mean-variance (MV) asset allocation problems in general incomplete markets. Besides of the conventional MV objective on portfolio's terminal wealth, our framework can accomm...
manuscripts.keywords: Stochastic Controls, Time Inconsistency, Mean-Variance Asset Allocation, Incomplete Markets, Backward Stochastic Differential Equations, Nonlocality

manuscripts.title: Simulation of Regularised Calibrated Heston-LSV
manuscripts.abstract: We analyse a Monte Carlo particle method for the simulation of the calibrated Heston-type local stochastic volatility (H-LSV) model. The common application of a kernel estimator for a conditional expe...
manuscripts.keywords: Interacting particle system, McKean-Vlasov SDEs, Irregular coefficients, Euler-Maruyama scheme, Well-posedness

manuscripts.title: CRRA Utility with General Transaction Costs
manuscripts.corresponding_author: Qiang Zhang (Beijing Normal-Hong Kong Baptist University)
manuscripts.abstract: Transaction costs play a critical role in asset allocation and consumption strategies in portfolio management. This is also an important practical issue for fund managers. We present the closed-form s...
manuscripts.keywords: Portfolio management, transaction costs, optimal investment strategy, optimal consumption strategy, CRRA utility
